title: Freight, demurrage & defense (FD&D) insurance
dataVerified: Shipowner, vessel, FD&D insurer, dispute coverage, legal defense limits
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/cancelled). Link to FD&D insurer system (authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Domain binding verifies FD&D insurer. Charter party disputes. Legal defense coverage. Maritime arbitration financing. Protects against demurrage claims.
